version_description:
* fixed: deleted languages keep being re-downloaded
* fixed: search sometimes stops working

* improves search for diacritic characters
* minor bugfixes

Wokabulary 4 is a complete re-design and brings an all new, much improved interface.
This major update increases usability, stability and joy of use.

Main improvements:
* Easy and powerful search and filters
* Re-designed Quiz
* Awesome statistics

Main improvements:

4.0.1 fixes a problem with language migration for users that do not sync with iCloud.

New Features
• Multitasking / Split Screen support on iPad

Bugfixes
• Quiz progress is not saved sometimes
• Comment and Don’t-Ask-Again checkbox are not shown long enough in Flash Card Quiz
• Language migration dialog cannot be closed
• Statistics details are hard to select
• Changing levels does not update Don’t-Ask-Again checkbox correctly
• Quizzing all words from a filter does not update Quiz setup correctly
• Tags are mis-aligned when rotating
• Word edits are sometimes reset during sync
• Fixed some rare crashes

Bugfixes:
• Quiz statistics pie chart was cut off in iOS 10
• Quiz was limited to 100 words
• Edits on words would sometimes be reset after sync
• Sometimes quiz progress was not saved correctly

To all our users who sent us feedback: this version is for you!
We got a lot of requests to make the quiz design clearer and provide more space for complete sentences. So the new re-designed Quiz brings more space, more contrast and more color.
Also some of you said the word list was wasting too much screen estate, so we made it tighter and also adjusted the tags display to be more toned down.
Finally, even though no one asked for it, Wokabulary 4.2 can now read out words for a wide range of languages. Now, when practicing your vocabulary you can also practice pronunciation.

Thank you all very much for using Wokabulary and for providing bug reports and feature requests. We hope you like this new version as much as we do and we are looking forward to your feedback.

New features:
• Quiz can now read out foreign words of all major languages
• Quiz and vocabulary view have been redesigned for better usability
• Improved word selection in Quiz for better learning results

Bugfixes:
• Changing languages would unnecessarily reorder list of languages
• Order of foreign language and your language would not be consistent in interface
• Selected words for quiz would sometimes not be shuffled correctly

Makes Dark Mode work correctly. Sorry for breaking it!
We will do more fine tuning in upcoming versions.
This version is all about Dark Mode. You will find small visual improvements in Dark Mode everywhere.

Bugs fixed:
• Keyboard would not automatically switch depending on language
• Tags editing field would not display correctly in Dark Mode

Improvements on the quiz algorithm:

• Words from unknown levels will be selected much smarter
• Repeating wrong answered words in a quiz will shuffle the words better
• You can now (but shouldn't) select up to 999 words for a quiz
• Tag filters will now OR multiple tags instead of ANDing them
